@@ -124,0 +122,11 @@
+    /**
+     * Moves mouse pointer to given screen coordinates.
+     *
+     * @param   position    Target position
+     *
+     * @see     java.awt.Robot#mouseMove(int, int)
+     */
+    public synchronized void mouseMove(Point position) {
+        mouseMove(position.x, position.y);
+    }
